channel.title: Minetest - A open-source minecraft inspired game
channel.description:
Thought that some of you may like to look at it, and possibly take the open-source code and build on it. I plan to myself, maybe even start my own form of a block-building game.
Website: http://minetest.net/
Github: https://github.com/celeron55/minetest

item.title: Minetest - A open-source minecraft inspired game
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

xx matty xx:

does this connect to minecraft servers? if not, you should make it do so! a non-shit minecraft client would be awesome.

Would probably require changing the around 60% of the minetest code to match minecraft just to make it work. Not to mention all of the missing blocks.

Read full topic
item.source: Minetest - A open-source minecraft inspired game

item.title: Minetest - A open-source minecraft inspired game
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Anyone else smell a mopartest server in the future?

Wont happen at all, minecraft is far better with many more features, since minetest is still (imo) in pre-alpha stages, I wouldn’t even consider trying to host a server.

Read full topic
